org.apache.hadoop.fs.swift.snative

类 SwiftNativeFileSystemStore

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.hadoop.fs.swift.snative.SwiftNativeFileSystemStore

  • public class SwiftNativeFileSystemStore
extends Object
    File system store implementation. Makes REST requests, parses data from responses

      • initialize

        public void initialize(URI fsURI,
              org.apache.hadoop.conf.Configuration configuration)
                throws IOException
        Initalize the filesystem store -this creates the REST client binding.
        参数:
        fsURI - URI of the filesystem, which is used to map to the filesystem-specific options in the configuration file
        configuration - configuration
        抛出:
        IOException - on any failure.

        Get the default blocksize of this (bound) filesystem
        返回:
        the blocksize returned for all FileStatus queries, which is used by the MapReduce splitter.

              InputStream inputStream,
              long length)
                throws IOException
        Upload a file/input stream of a specific length.
        参数:
        path - destination path in the swift filesystem
        inputStream - input data. This is closed afterwards, always
        length - length of the data
        抛出:
        IOException - on a problem

        参数:

        返回:
        the header list
        抛出:

      • getObjectMetadata

        public SwiftFileStatus getObjectMetadata(org.apache.hadoop.fs.Path path,
                                boolean newest)
                                  throws IOException,
                                         FileNotFoundException
        Get the metadata of an object
        参数:
        path - path
        newest - flag to say "set the newest header", otherwise take any entry
        返回:
        file metadata. -or null if no headers were received back from the server.
        抛出:
        IOException - on a problem
        FileNotFoundException - if there is nothing at the end

      • listSubPaths

        public org.apache.hadoop.fs.FileStatus[] listSubPaths(org.apache.hadoop.fs.Path path,
                                             boolean recursive,
                                             boolean newest)
                                               throws IOException
        List all elements in this directory
        参数:
        path - path to work with
        recursive - do a recursive get
        newest - ask for the newest, or can some out of date data work?
        返回:
        the file statuses, or an empty array if there are no children
        抛出:
        IOException - on IO problems
        FileNotFoundException - if the path is nonexistent

      • rename

        public void rename(org.apache.hadoop.fs.Path src,
          org.apache.hadoop.fs.Path dst)
            throws FileNotFoundException,
                   SwiftOperationFailedException,
                   IOException
        Rename through copy-and-delete. this is a consequence of the Swift filesystem using the path as the hash into the Distributed Hash Table, "the ring" of filenames.

        Because of the nature of the operation, it is not atomic.

        参数:
        src - source file/dir
        dst - destination
        抛出:
        IOException - IO failure
        SwiftOperationFailedException - if the rename failed
        FileNotFoundException - if the source directory is missing, or the parent directory of the destination

      • copy

        public void copy(org.apache.hadoop.fs.Path srcKey,
        org.apache.hadoop.fs.Path dstKey)
          throws IOException
        抛出:
        IOException

      • getCorrectSwiftPath

        public org.apache.hadoop.fs.Path getCorrectSwiftPath(org.apache.hadoop.fs.Path path)
                                              throws SwiftException
        Take a Hadoop path and return one which uses the URI prefix and authority of this FS. It doesn't make a relative path absolute
        参数:
        path - path in
        返回:
        path with a URI bound to this FS
        抛出:
        SwiftException - URI cannot be created.

      • extractUris

        public static List<URI> extractUris(String json,
                    org.apache.hadoop.fs.Path path)
                             throws SwiftOperationFailedException
        extracts URIs from json
        参数:
        json - json to parse
        path - path (used in exceptions)
        返回:
        URIs
        抛出:
        SwiftOperationFailedException - on any problem parsing the JSON

        返回:

      • delete

        public boolean delete(org.apache.hadoop.fs.Path absolutePath,
             boolean recursive)
               throws IOException
        Delete the entire tree. This is an internal one with slightly different behavior: if an entry is missing, a FileNotFoundException is raised. This lets the caller distinguish a file not found with other reasons for failure, so handles race conditions in recursive directory deletes better.

        The problem being addressed is: caller A requests a recursive directory of directory /dir ; caller B requests a delete of a file /dir/file, between caller A enumerating the files contents, and requesting a delete of /dir/file. We want to recognise the special case "directed file is no longer there" and not convert that into a failure

        参数:
        absolutePath - the path to delete.
        recursive - if path is a directory and set to true, the directory is deleted else throws an exception if the directory is not empty case of a file the recursive can be set to either true or false.
        返回:
        true if the object was deleted
        抛出:
        IOException - IO problems
        FileNotFoundException - if a file/dir being deleted is not there - this includes entries below the specified path, (if the path is a dir and recursive is true)
